ygData.subject: Runescale Cloak Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I just got a rune of scales off of some croc in oasis. someone told me that they are used for the runescale cloak quest. i want to do this quest but i was
ygData.messageBody:
I just got a rune of scales off of some croc in
oasis. someone told me that they are used for the
runescale cloak quest. i want to do this quest but i was
wondering if anyone could tell me if it is a high level
quest, i am only level 14. also, how do you get to the
temple of solusek ro?<br>if anyone knows of a quest that
a lev 14 wizard could complete please let me
know.<br><br>Talrasha<br>Level 14 Wizard<br>Veeshan
